events.text:
Welcome the the long awaited StayInShape party!
Every year, many shapes come to this intershapial party to mingle amongst each other.
You are [pn], a [ps].
Years ago, your parents moved away from [pht], your hometown, to the other side of the world. Since then, you've had trouble fitting in with all these unknown shapes, and mostly confined yourself indoors.
Today is different though, as you gathered the courage to head out to a party, aiming to form some friends.
Hopefully you find a place where you can fit in!
(WASD to move)
